title: PHYS 407 Introduction to General Relativity
description: Physical consequences of Einstein's equations, including the principle of equivalence, curved space-time, geodesics, the Schwarzschild solution, deflection of light, black holes, and gravitational radiation.
prerequisites: One of MATH 217, MATH 227, MATH 317 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255. (PHYS 301 and one of PHYS 206, PHYS 306 are recommended.)
